channel.title: 562 client options?
channel.description: How do you make an option bar on a 562 client? As in like how it has Options Like - File | Ip | Port | Etc. How can I add that? Also on my client title page I have like Members and non members. They both go to the same world but I would like to make the members login only available to donation and I also want the full screen feature only available to people who go on the members login.

item.title: 562 client options?
item.dc:creator: @Bumm85 Bumm85
item.description:
@Bumm85 wrote:

How do you make an option bar on a 562 client? As in like how it has Options Like - File | Ip | Port | Etc.
How can I add that? Also on my client title page I have like Members and non members. They both go to the same world but I would like to make the members login only available to donation and I also want the full screen feature only available to people who go on the members login.

Read full topic
